text:
9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! Updated: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 16:47 [IST] 
Hollywood has always been, say the first industry to witness the variety of sexuality. When there are Gays, Lesbians, Transgenders and now a new addition to the family, Pansexuals, whose sexuality isn't restricted to one particular gender. 
Hollywood has also witnessed the growing number of celebrity couples, where the women are taller than their men. It isn't an odd combination or doesn't look eerie when the couple is spotted together with a mismatch in their heights. It is rather stunning as to how they have looked so gorgeous together and have had happy relationships. 
Maybe since the time mankind was first created, the idea of a man being taller than the wife has been prevalent. No matter how open minded humans have gotten over the years, it is not quite accepted or appreciated in the society if the man is shorter than the woman, in a relationship.But we have gradually evolved to push the idea aside and choose our partner based on other parameters. One such community that goes parallel to the society that calls itself normal is LGBT community. 
Like Daniel Radcliffe says, one's height doesn't really matter as long as you know how to use it and manage to grab big roles and make big bucks! 
Below we have picked 9 Hollywood celebrities who look absolutely stunning together: 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 1/10 Tom Cruise And Katie Holmes 
The Mission Impossible actor Tom's Cruise's 5 ft 9 inches ex-wife Katie Holmes, always towered her 5 ft 7 inches ex-husband. The couple got married in 2006 and got divorced in 2012. Tom Cruise's other ex-wife Nichole Kidman was taller than him too. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 2/10 John Legend And Crissy Teigen 
The 'All of Me' singer John Legend is 5 ft 8.5 inches tall and his swimsuit model wife Chrissy Teigen stands taller than him by just half an inch. She does tower him if she's on stilettos! The couple recently announced that they were pregnant. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 3/10 Daniel Radcliffe And Erin Darke 
The 'Harry Potter' actor's girlfriend Erin Darke is 5 ft 7 inches and the actor himself stands at about 5 ft 5 inches tall. The actor in his recent interview with a magazine gushed about his super smart and funny girlfriend. The couple has been together since 2013. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 4/10 Cameron Diaz And Benji Madden 
Actress Cameron Diaz 5 ft 8 inches tall, towers her husband musician husband Benji Madden who is 5 ft 6 inches. Cameron and Benji supposedly have issues in their marriage as she's unable to conceive a child. They couple is trying to work things out between them. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 5/10 Adam Levine And Behati Prinsloo 
The Maroon 5 singer broke too may hearts when he wedded Victoria's Angel Behati Prinsloo, who is 5 ft 11 inches tall! Adam is a tad bit shorter than his wife. The couple had a low profile wedding in 2014. Adam was dating another Victoria's secret model Nina Agdal, before Behati Prinsloo. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 6/10 Mark Anthony And Jennifer Lopez 
The 5 ft 6 inches tall musician Jennifer Lopez is half an inch taller than her ex-husband Marc Anthony. The couple was married for 10 years until they called off their marriage in 2014. Jennifer has acted in movies and been one of the judges on 'American Idol'. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 7/10 Keith Urban And Nicole Kidman 
5 ft 11 inches tall Nichole Kidman's 3 inches taller than her 5 ft 8 inches actor husband Keith Urban. The couple has been married for 9 years now. Recently there's been rumours in the air that the couple is going through a rough patch in their marriage. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 8/10 Pharell Williams And Helen Lasichanh 
The 'Happy' singer Pharell Williams is 5 ft 8 inches and his model wife Helen Lasichanh is 5 ft 11 inches! Pharell considers Helen his best friend. Apparently, the model and designer wife stole his heart from the very start. They have a son named Rocket Ayer. 9 Hollywood Hunks Shorter Than Their Women! 9/10 Jack Black And Tanya Haden 
Jack Black, is one of the shortest actors in Hollywood who has done justice to all his roles against tall actresses. Jack is 5 ft 6 inches tall and his wife Tanya Haden is 5 ft 7.5 inches. Jack Black is married to Tanya Haden since 2006. You might like
